means: （灵敏度模式呈心形的）定向麦克风
（麦克风）灵敏度模式呈心脏形的

sentence.Network_en: Construct rotating cardioid and astroid while remaining orthogonal to each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 作旋转的心脏线和旋转的星状线,且彼此维持正交.

sentence.Network_en: Construct rotating cardioid and deltoid while remaining orthogonal to each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 作旋转的心脏线和旋转的三角线,且彼此维持正交.

sentence.Network_en: Construct rotating cardioid and nephroid while remaining orthogonal to each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 作旋转的心脏线和旋转的肾脏线,且彼此维持正交.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文心形线,calculus的网易博客,高等数学课件、函数图形动画、数学软件应用,... 心形线(Cardioid)因其形状像一个心而得名。...心形线可以看成一个圆在另一个半径相同的圆.
图文= $\overline{MP'}$ =给定圆O的直径,则所有此种 P与P'点所成的图形称为以给定圆 O为基圆 (base circle)、 A为歧点 (cusp point)的心脏线(cardioid).
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... capacity 容量 cardioid 心脏 Cartesian coordinates 笛卡儿坐标.
cardioid reception 心脏形接收cardioid 心形曲线cardiotonic 强心剂

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Greek kardioeidēs 'heart-shaped', from kardia 'heart' + eidos 'form'

means.word_mean: 1. an epicycloid in which the rolling circle equals the fixed circle
